posts.postText:
To whom it may concern,
I would like to start by saying that I love this server and all the people I play with on this server. everyone is respectful for the most part and ever since I joined this server I have not gone to any other TTT servers. mostly because the server does not lag and the people are cool.

Let me get to the point though. I have been banned from the server and want to know why. The reason given to me was mass RDMing but I did not mass RDM. I would like to know who has been accusing me of this and possibly clear up the issue.

Thanks in advance,
Sneekinbye

To see who banned you try looking here: http://onlinecomphelp.com/bans/bans.php/

Information on Unban Requests here: http://www.nonerdsjustgeeks.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=14&t=1946

If you want to be unbanned please post an Unban Request in the correct format here: http://www.nonerdsjustgeeks.com/forum/viewforum.php?f=14
I vouge for him, ive played with him alot and hes never like acted like a troll or rdmed. So i dont see why hes banned?
thank you i was not sure where to post
